mapper.select: SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, DATE_FORMAT(LP_CPTR_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') as LP_CPTR_ONLYDATE, DATE_FORMAT(LP_CPTR_TIME,'%H:%i') as LP_CPTR_ONLYTIME, ACT_PWRER, RSD_ID, LP_ACT_PWRER, LP_GND_RACT_PWRER AS LP_RACT_PWRER, LP_TRTH_RACT_PWRER AS RACT_PWRER FROM EMST_RAW_DATA, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R WHERE RSD_ID= #{RSD_ID} AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 HOUR) < DATE_FORMAT(LP_CPTR_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
